contest-event.event-date: Jan. 30, 1977 D Durham League Contest (Section D) Durham League Contest (Section D) 40 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-d The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Little Suite for Brass [Arnold] Community Centre, Thornley Prizes - 1st 18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 8 bands competed.
